songs.title: Cavities
songs.lyrics:
I need some time
I just need a minute
I gotta get my head right
I gotta make sure that tonight, tonight
Tonight is that last night i see you like this
To get better is my only wish
For you to see me for me
I've always been this way you see
Maybe next year when the weather gets colder
I'll look back over my shoulder

Would you believe the things I've seen
At this point I've gained control
Of my stupid tendencies

Blade cut go ahead deeper
You thought I would be weaker
You know that I love this pain
Knife touch baby it keeps me sane (x2)
